trends: There has been one other sighting in Courtice
There were no other sightings in Courtice on or around March 15th 1999
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding my bike when suddenly all of the lights of the houses near by went out and then a noise, that sounded like a futristic vucumcleaner along with a pulsating ring of light went by, at the time of the sighting my mind was blank, but after it went by I realize that I saw a UFO, after I saw it I shouted "I believe, I believe!" I came to realize that it went down Nash road in Courtice towards Newcastle at a increadible speed.
